price: 32. En als zij hen zagen, zeiden zei: “Waarlijk! Zij zijn zeker afgedwaald!”
arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ra-awhum qālū inna hāulāi laḍāllūna
